title: Mithras - Behind the Shadows Lie Madness (2007)
description:
Usually I&#039;m not a big fan of Experimental Death Metal, but these guys are just fucking good.  They play around with the music a little bit throughout this album, but it is nevertheless a great fucking album.  Give it a shot, and fucking seed you motherfuckers.

Mithras

Behind the Shadows Lie Madness - (2007)

1. The Journey and the Forsaken
2. To Fall From the Heavens
3. Under the Three Spheres
4. Into Black Holes of Oblivion
5. When the Light Fades Away
6. Behind the Shadows
7. Awaken Man and Stone
8. The Twisted Tower
9. To Where the Sun Never Leaves
10.The Beacon Beckons
11.Thrown Upon the Waves
12.Into the Unknown
